column5: what did i miss???im sitting waiting for the speed skating and watching the downhill re run
Snowboarding..got the lead stole.  I told my son it doesn't matter cause its not really a sport
That was really close! Oh well still a silver

so lets go for a run down the hill if it's not a sport it must be easy to do LOL I have snowboarded for like 15 years and those guys are amazing athletes my local news said he won gold and I had PVRd it and then I watched it expecting to see Robertson win was I ever p-ed when he got passed .it's not for everyone hard for the elderly to accept new things LOL just kidding
I've never snowboarded but I think that's a great event. I also really liked the moguls, and not just because we got medals.  JF
It gives me a chance to bug my son...a getting even sorta thing
